amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate to emphasize that financial assistance may be provided for the performance of activities by the Army National Guard without use of competitive procedures under standard exceptions to the use of such procedures.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2571 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
